books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A man and woman who have gone their separate ways return to their Southern town for the funeral of a friend.
books.name: THE BEST OF ME

books.author: by Iris Johansen
books.description: The forensic sculptor Eve Duncan learns more about her daughter’s disappearance and the girl’s father’s possible involvement.
books.name: BONNIE

books.author: by James Patterson and Richard DiLallo
books.description: A widow keeps the identity of the new man she is about to marry a secret as her children gather for Christmas.
books.name: THE CHRISTMAS WEDDING

books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: For Jack Reacher, an elite military police officer, it all started in 1997. A lonely railroad track. A crime scene. A cover-up.
books.name: THE AFFAIR

books.author: by Sophie Kinsella
books.description: A woman reveals the most intimate details of her life to a man who turns out to be the C.E.O. of the company for which she works.
books.name: CAN YOU KEEP A SECRET?

books.author: by Darcie Chan
books.description: Only one man knows an abused widow, which revealed will change many lives in her small Vermont town.
books.name: THE MILL RIVER RECLUSE

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Virgil Flowers investigates bombings directed against a superstore chain seeking to open a store in a Minnesota river town.
books.name: SHOCK WAVE

books.author: by Chris Culver
books.description: Against orders, a former homicide detective begins an investigation into his niece's murder.
books.name: THE ABBEY

books.author: by Jeffrey Eugenides
books.description: Three Brown graduates in the early 1980s wrestle with love, religion and coming of age.
books.name: THE MARRIAGE PLOT

books.author: by Joel C. Rosenberg
books.description: A C.I.A. operative is ordered to destroy Iran’s nuclear weapons to forestall a war with Israel.
books.name: THE TEHRAN INITIATIVE

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: A woman and a man accused of murder evade the authorities as they search for her dead husband’s secrets.
books.name: LETHAL

books.author: by Douglas E. Richards
books.description: A former Special Forces operative searches for an enigmatic woman linked with a bio-terror plot that threatens millions.
books.name: WIRED

books.author: by Julian Barnes
books.description: In this Man Booker Prize-winning novel, an unexpected bequest causes a man in his 60s to question his understanding of the past.
books.name: THE SENSE OF AN ENDING

books.author: by Philippa Gregory
books.description: A novel set during the War of the Roses.
books.name: THE LADY OF THE RIVERS
